title: Teku silently stalls when existing storage is incompatible with configured network
body:
### Description
When starting Teku from an existing database using `minimal` configuration but configuring Teku for `altona`, it gets as far as `Initializing storage` and hangs.

The problem is that `StorageBackedRecentChainData.requestInitialStoreWithRetry` is automatically retrying when the request to load the initial store fails for any reason and suppressing the error.  It should only retry on timeout exceptions.  The suppressed exception is:

(Adrian) we could potentially store the initial validator set hash, which won't change ever...
